title: How to download all my music from iCloud to my iPhone 7 - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t believe that the Music app has a single button for downloading all of your music at one time. Instead, by each album or song in Music, you’ll find an icon of a cloud with an arrow pointing downward. Tap on that symbol, and the album or song will be downloaded into the app. Depending on how much music you have stored in the Cloud, this could take a while.
